column4: do i need to reinstall Ubuntu to change the keyboard layout ?
no
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
gksudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst
<hint> please know what your doing before trying it as it can leave your system bootless

i don't know what i'm doing :-) i see menu.lst is still the one from Ubuntu. however i have now a boot record that lists Suse as the first option, and i would like to place Ubuntu (which is now second) there first. do i need to do this in lilo ?
look at help.ubuntu.com there is a section in there that tells you how to do it
is it searchable ? i don't see grub mentioned there.
hold on ill get you the page
https://help.ubuntu.com/6.10/ubuntu/desktopguide/C/ch10s05.html
thanks, but the menu.lst is still the original ubuntu one. but it is not in effect anymore. how can i overwrite the record now in effect, generated by Suse ?
did you install ubuntu or suse last
it should already be using suses than
are you running beryl or compiz?
the problem stopped when i closed firefox now ...
did you see the new firefox and thunderbird vulnerabilities published today ?
no i dont use ff 2.0
does it concern 3.0?
if you have a link let me see it anyway but if 2.0.0.1 fixes it than its already been requested
yes
do you recommend it ?
no
